record.id: field.name="$L.command.array" and file.name="status" and term=NULL and format.name="system.status.list.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: $L.command.array
record.file.name: status
record.format.name: system.status.list.g

brief.brief: Enter the command to execute and click 'Execute Commands'. The commands available are:

detail.detail: S - Select record for more information. Will display additional information on record selected and allow access to record specific operations (i.e. send msg, stop scheduler).
K - Kill task displayed on this line. Some "SYSTEM" tasks cannot be killed. This option should only be used "as a last resort".
